name: mcp-security-framework
summary: Universal security framework for microservices with SSL/TLS, authentication, authorization, and rate limiting. Added MCPProxy role to CertificateRole enum. Enhanced certificate role validation with allow_roles and deny_roles parameters at all validation levels. All tests now use real certificates instead of mocks. Comprehensive test coverage with 1004+ tests. Requires cryptography>=42.0.0 for certificate operations.
